Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. (Health Unit) -- 2 Mills Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of East Carroll, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy the Tax at a rate of two (2) mills on all property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $86,200 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for an additional ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, with the proceeds thereof to be used exclusively for acquiring, administering, constructing, improving, maintaining, operating and/or supporting the East Carroll Parish Health Unit, including its facilities, equipment and furnishings?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Hospital Service Dist. -- 10.57 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Hospital Service District Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall East Carroll Parish Hospital Service District, East Carroll Parish, Louisiana (the "District"), be authorized to levy a special tax of ten and fifty-seven hundredths (10.57) mills on all property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $462,960 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2018 and ending with the year 2027, with the avails or proceeds of said tax to be used exclusively for the operation and maintenance of the East Carroll Parish Hospital?
